NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addAdmin(address)":{"details":"add admin","params":{"account":"address to add"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. 0xe8b6b0a00eff82a99c2e542337c9d30671007d1695d50ec86c42d8cb0df6885a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b3ff38964b99aa1515c093f91e9a530c89c1a011ac3104bb8619304d787dfcc0","dweb:/ipfs/QmRvvB1cWbbvJPN8jkrpEVB7BKV6cgjaz4zZSW91bxQ9gx"]},"src/common/AuthControl.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbe41cff50ff7761fd4e26ac29efbb6d1f8502509e58f90a45994f81762c081cd","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://bdbc6e16cd3896232c6ca672a46347a41fca21bf2b31152f92c157bf91bf3120","dweb:/ipfs/QmPUYBx9AvuAF8RtJqtZQETuiLLnkmKJ68fY2suKhxMdtP"]},"src/common/AuthRole.sol":{"keccak256":"0x592c1b768ffede0825cab31fd7cd5a3d8ffe7f68adce5fa0136b16c920df739b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://68cb4436b7ac4193979db957e618838d7eb8375a60e7004cc5af36e761461a7d","dweb:/ipfs/QmW3KeKShqoo9apw8BeHaLMMkUpfsV6wNfzcNKgL24KgcJ"]},"src/proxy/ProxyStorage.sol":{"keccak256":"0x412d993265a6f20779b0cfcbc0c132aa580e183438eb5208e4deef671702b335","license":"Unlicense","urls":["bzz-raw://166e5b647c08fd63d023032fb08937879b30b2f39ec872ecca37178d28da8a88","dweb:/ipfs/QmSF2beNGV8edN6Mh7F97ogmDAUS2RPmGiPVJDvoWUGnJx"]}},"version":1}

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

initialize(address,address,uint256,addre.details: Can only be called once. Grants the caller the default admin role.

params._ton: The address of the TON token contract.
params._treasury: The address of the treasury contract.
params._wston: The address of the WSTON token contract.

pause().details: Only callable by the owner when the contract is not paused.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

swap(uint256).details: The function checks allowances and balances before performing the swap. Emits a `SwappedWstonForTon` event upon successful swap.Before using this funciton, treasury must approve this contract for TON => type(uint256).max

params.wstonAmount: The amount of WSTON tokens to swap.

unpause().details: Only callable by the owner when the contract is paused.

updateStakingIndex(uint256).details: The new index must be greater than or equal to 10^27. Emits a `StakingIndexUpdated` event upon successful update.

initialize(address,address,uint256,addre.notice: Initializes the WstonSwapPool contract with the given parameters.

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, preventing certain actions.

swap(uint256).notice: Swaps a specified amount of WSTON for TON tokens.

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract, allowing actions to be performed.

updateStakingIndex(uint256).notice: Updates the staking index used for calculating swap rates.
